column3: I'm a busy man, so state your business or leave me to mine.
What is the purpose of the station?
I oversee all operations here at Black Brush Station. Have been doing so since it was constructed.
Shipments of ore arrive daily, and we have to unload and sort it all for the furnaces.
Takes a strong back and sure hands. I should know─used to be a smelter myself, until the Calamity crippled my arm and put an end to that.
We extract metal from ore. Bronze, silver, mythril─you name it, we smelt it.
See all that smoke? It comes from our furnaces. We keep them burning day and night with a steady supply of fire crystals.
Aye, without me and my boys sweating it out here, the lords and ladies wouldn't be able to deck themselves out in fancy baubles.
